title: Ditch that dress and take cue from Kangana's heart-y saree this Valentine's Day : Fashion, News - India Today
text:
Ditch that dress and take cue from Kangana's heart-y saree this Valentine's Day The actress' latest saree might just be the perfect pick for a Valentine's Day date. IndiaToday.in | Posted by Mini Dixit 
Shahid Kapoor , Saif Ali Khan and Kangana Ranaut, are promoting the movie rigorously. 
Spotted together recently, the movie's starcast looked its fashionable best while on yet another promotional stint. While both Shahid and Saif kept things casual by pairing round-neck tees with jackets, it was Kangana's saree we're all heart(s) for. 
Dressed in a pastel-hued, pink saree with heart motifs, Kangana gave the world some serious Valentine's Day fashion inspiration. Photo: Yogen Shah 
Styled by Ami Patel and Sanjay Kumar Dauhaliya, Kangana looked every bit a vintage heroine in her Galang Gabaan saree that was paired with a puffed-sleeve blouse. 
Add to that some subtle makeup, perfect curls and a pair of elegant earring by Amrapali Jewels, and you're good to go.
